# Condition

## if-else

```{r}
num <- 1
if(num > 0) {
  cat("The number is greater than 0")
} else if(num < 0) {
  cat("The number is less than 0")
} else {
  cat("The number is 0")
}
```

## ifelse

```{r}
num1 <- 2
num2 <- 3
num3 <- ifelse(num1 > 0 & num2 < 0, 1, 0)
```
